name: 310-create-user
description: Create a user inside the LXC container with specified username, uid, gid, and optional mountpoint write check. Calls create-user.sh with template variables.

commands.description: Create a user inside the LXC container with specified username, uid, gid, and optional mountpoint write check. Calls create-user.sh with template variables.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username to create inside the LXC container.

parameters.name: mountpoint
parameters.description: Optional: The mountpoint to check for write access. Can be empty if not needed.

notes: All parameters except mountpoint must be set and not empty. The script is idempotent and outputs errors to stderr.
